extendedInfo.description: Free Daily motivational and inspirational quotes for  your Android phone. Over 500 inspirational quotes to motivate you throughout the day. Includes quotes about attitude, business, career, dreams, life, happiness, leadership, money, motivation, opportunities, success, and more! Stay Focused. Stay Motivated. Stay Inspired. With our quote app you will have access to the best, famous, inspirational and  motivational daily quotes. Share the daily motivational quotations and sayings to your family and friends and spread the happiness!We strive to make the best motivational app for your Android device. Here are some of the awesome features of this inspirational app:- Simple to use app containing over 500 handpicked quotes to inspire you.- High-quality, beautiful backgrounds; you can let the app randomly display a different background for each quote or set the background yourself.- Ability to favorite quotes so you can easily view or share them later.- Copy to clipboard so you can share it anyway you want to.- Share via Facebook, Twitter, text message, email, and more!- Store app on your phone's SD storage to save space (Please note the widget will not work in this case - Android does not allow widgets to work from a SD card).- Quote widget to display hourly or daily inspirational quotes.- Continued improvement of this app, please send us feedback or suggestions.Keywords: quotes, daily quotes, daily motivational quotes, quotations, brilliant, famous, famous quotes, famous quotations, brilliant quotes, brilliant quotations, motivation, life, love, inspiration, work, success, leadership, motivational quotes, inspirational quotes, best quotes, famous authors, famous actors.Includes quotes about life, happiness, attitude, opportunities, dreams, relationships, leadership, business, career, money, achievement, success, and more!Permissions requested by this app (and why):- Internet (Access the internet; required to load ads.)- Access Network State (Also required for ads, used to prevent attempts to load ads over the internet if not connected.)- Vibrate (Phone will vibrate when you favorite or unfavorite a quote.)

reviews.title: Great but ads still show.
reviews.comment: I paid but ads still show when I open ap. But if I close and reopen,  ads are gone. I hope you fix this, so I can give better rate.
reviews.author: Diane Pickhardt

reviews.title: i have made my payment but the ad still appear
reviews.comment: i dont understand why the ad still appear despite the fact that i had already made the payment

reviews.title: Fires me up!
reviews.comment: Love the app, thanks for the effort you have put in. I have never noticed the ads, guess my eyes are enjoying the quotes top much to look!

reviews.title: Annoying ads
reviews.comment: Ads pop up too frequently. I understand paying gets rid of them and supports the app but they are too frequent. Quotes are good though. Going with another app in the meantime.
